price: 63. Ils dirent : « Nous sommes plutôt venus t’apporter (le châtiment) à propos duquel ils étaient dans le doute.
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ جِئۡنَٰكَ بِمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal ji'nāka bimā kānū fīhi yamtarūna
